message.body: How's your newly older heart?
I just had a paroxysm of vinyl record therapy. So I'm excited/exhausted. How's your heart?
I'm ok. :) I love school.
Yeah? Tell me about it
It's just what I'm supposed to do. It feels magical every day in the true sense of the word. I'm learning so much about myself, my relationships, the art, and performance. It's crazy.
God that's great to hear. And do you love the city?
Honestly, I've had little time to explore but what I've seen I love!
We play a place called The North Star on November 10th if you're free.
In Philly? I'll be in NYC 10th.... :(
We're in NYC on the 9th ;)
But I'm in Philly the 9th... I'm going up to see a show after school on the 10th for the night. I'm super disappointed that I can't see you play!
No worries. Who are you seeing?
It's an Irish theatre company actually. And I am worried bc I would really really like to.
You're worried about what?
Not coming? It's really ok Martha
Im just disappointed
We can skype and I'll sing you some proto jams. Probably won't paint my face though
I'll have to pay the big bucks for the robot.
You know it. Big bucks or one boob.
One boob for no face paint but one ball out the pants.
The old boobs for balls swap. I'm into it.
What time is your show on the 10th?
Not sure. It's really ok if you miss this one though cause wheel be back within 6 months.
Well I just found out that ill get back at 10
Anyway we'll see
If you show up, I'll let a ball hang out of my jeans.
I'm holding you to that.
I can already imagine the look on your face
Pure delight?
Your lips reading "bumblebee tuna"
Mondegreen what?
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7ZcsARqmq1U&feature=youtube_gdata_player
I'm your friend that's into music not bad movie references
Bumblebee Tuna is the Frankly my dear, I don't give a damn of our generation
God I hope not
